thread.title: Delays on trains at Cardiff Central due to overcrowding
thread.title_full: Delays on trains at Cardiff Central due to overcrowding | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Delays on trains at Cardiff Central due to overcrowding
text:
Rugby fans heading out of Cardiff after the match Credit: Arriva Trains Wales There are delays on trains out of Cardiff Central due to overcrowding.
Arriva Trains Wales and First Great Western Services are behind schedule by around 40 minutes.
It follows a day of disruption due to 'underestimated' numbers of rugby fans travelling to the city to watch Ireland play Canada at the Millennium Stadium.
Last updated Sat 19 Sep 2015 Read more 8 updates First Great Western apologises to rugby fans for train delays Travel Rugby World Cup 2015 Cardiff Wales
